author: Natasha Lomas
title: Delivery Hero urges users to go cashless, no contact for food deliveries
description: Delivery Hero has switched to cash-less, non-contact for deliveries in areas it defines as “high risk” for the transmission of the SARS-CoV-2 virus to reduce personal contact between couriers and customers during the coronavirus pandemic. But it’s encouraging…
